allocateCallback(uint256,uint256,bytes).code: function allocateCallback(uint256 delRisky, uint256 delStable, bytes data) external nonpayable

delRisky.description: Amount of risky tokens required to provide to risky reserve

delStable.description: Amount of stable tokens required to provide to stable reserve

data.description: Calldata passed on allocate function call

allocateCallback(uint256,uint256,bytes).notice: Triggered when providing liquidity to an Engine
